description:
Check out some 2 player co-op gameplay of Towerborne from gamescom 2024. The game is releasing in early access on September 10th, 2024. Watch as we fight through a level and encounter the Pangojira boss! 

#gaming #towerborne #gamespot
title: 7 Minutes of Towerborne Co-Op gameplay | gamescom 2024

description:
At gamescom, Chris and Dave both played around an hour of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II!
  
Dave is already a paid-up member of the Imperium, but Chris doesn't know his Astartes from his elbow - how much enjoyment can a Warhammer novice get from Space Marine 2?

Check out Dave's in-depth preview, from the perspective of a Warhammer nerd, here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qYoMTJSzhiM&pp=ygUXZ2FtZXNwb3Qgc3BhY2UgbWFyaW5lIDI%3D 

 #spacemarines#warhammer#gamespot
title: Is Space Marine 2 Fun For A Warhammer Novice? | gamescom 2024

description:
You'll never Adam and Eve it, but Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, is back down in his helter-skelter to have a butchers at the weapons of the Fallout: London mod, including the Plasma Powerful Lewis Gun, the Tround Pistol, and another appearance of his beloved EM-2 rifle. Quali'y!

We want to introduce some Q&As into the episodes, so if you've got a question for Jonathan or the Expert Reacts team, leave them in the comments section and they may be answered in a future episode.

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down even more of the guns from Fallout: London, and compares them to their potential real-life counterparts.

00:00 Intro
00:44 Bayoneted Advanced Combat Shotgun
01:39 Laser Musket
04:17 Powerful Lewis Gun
06:08 Plasma Powerful Lewis Gun
07:04 Glow-Sighted Calibrated Powerful Service Pist
title: Firearms Expert Reacts to Fallout: London's Guns PART 2
